title:
Two part question--Why did they skip parts of Market Street when repaving it and why did they have to go back and dig up and repave where there are manhole covers and other round metal openings for water and sewer.  Also they left a couple of unpaved corners in fron of Nissan and other places.

Thank you.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=17490
